actions.name: create_text_to_sound
actions.description: Convert input text into “sound effects” using an AI model.

actions.name: create_text_to_speech
actions.description: Convert text into speech using a specified voice, language, gender, and age group.

actions.name: create_transcription
actions.description: Creates a task to process speech into readable text.

actions.name: create_translation
actions.description: Translate text from a source language to a target language.
